help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Find answers to your questions about Lavenius
help.notFound: Didn't find what you were looking for?

welcome.title: Welcome to Lavenius
welcome.content:
**Welcome to Lavenius!**

Lavenius is your comprehensive platform to manage your therapeutic practice in a simple and organized way.

**What can you do with Lavenius?**

- **Manage patients:** Record contact information, clinical history, and session notes
- **Schedule appointments:** Organize your calendar with in-person or remote sessions
- **Track billing:** Keep a record of pending and completed payments
- **Sync calendar:** Connect with Google Calendar to receive reminders
- **Analyze metrics:** View statistics of your practice

**Tip:** Use the sidebar to navigate between the different sections of the application.

createAccount.title: Create your account
createAccount.content:
**Registration in Lavenius**

Creating your account is quick and easy:

1. Click **"Start for free"** on the homepage
2. Enter your email address
3. Create a secure password
4. Verify your email (if required)
5. Done! You can now log in

**Account information:**

Your account includes:
- First and last name
- Email address (for login)
- Profile picture (optional)

**Note:** Lavenius uses secure authentication to protect your account.

completeProfile.title: Complete your professional profile
completeProfile.content:
**Profile Setup**

After creating your account, we'll guide you to complete your professional profile:

**Step 1: Professional Information**
- Professional license number (required)
- Specialty

**Step 2: Contact Information**
- Primary phone
- Alternative phone
- Office address

**Step 3: Online Presence**
- Website
- Instagram
- LinkedIn
- Professional bio

**Tip:** You can edit this information at any time from the **Profile** section in the sidebar.

**Why is this important?**

Your professional license helps us verify your practice and personalize your experience on the platform.

firstSteps.title: Recommended first steps
firstSteps.content:
**Where to start?**

We recommend following these steps to get the most out of Lavenius:

**1. Register your first patient**
- Go to **Patients** in the sidebar
- Click **"New Patient"**
- Fill in the basic data (name, phone, email)

**2. Schedule your first session**
- Go to **Schedule** in the sidebar
- Click **"New Appointment"**
- Select the patient and choose date/time

**3. Connect Google Calendar (optional)**
- Go to **Settings**
- In the "Calendar" section, connect your Google account
- Your appointments will sync automatically

**4. Set up your working hours**
- In **Settings**, define your working days and hours
- This will help organize your schedule better

**Need help?**

Explore the other sections of the Help Center to learn about each feature in detail.

agenda.title: Schedule
agenda.description: Learn how to manage your appointments

createSession.title: Create a new appointment
createSession.content:
To create a new appointment:

1. Go to the **Schedule** section from the sidebar
2. Click the **"New Appointment"** button
3. Select the patient from the list
4. Choose the date and time
5. Select the modality (in-person or remote)
6. Click **"Save"**

**Tip:** You can also create appointments by clicking directly on the calendar.

editSession.title: Edit or cancel an appointment
editSession.content:
To edit an existing appointment:

1. Find the appointment in the list or calendar
2. Click the **edit** icon (pencil)
3. Modify the necessary data
4. Save the changes

To cancel an appointment, change the status to "Cancelled" from the edit drawer.

googleCalendar.title: Connect Google Calendar
googleCalendar.content:
To sync with Google Calendar:

1. Go to **Settings** from the sidebar
2. In the "Calendar" section, click **"Connect Google Calendar"**
3. Authorize the application in the popup window
4. Once connected, your appointments will sync automatically

**Benefits:**
- Receive reminders on your phone
- Your patients receive calendar invitations
- See all your events in one place

createPatient.title: Register a new patient
createPatient.content:
To register a new patient:

1. Go to the **Patients** section from the sidebar
2. Click **"New Patient"**
3. Fill in the personal data (name, email, phone)
4. Add additional information (health insurance, session frequency)
5. Click **"Save"**

**Tip:** You can add initial notes in the observations field.

clinicalFile.title: Using the clinical file
clinicalFile.content:
The clinical file allows you to:

- View the complete patient history
- Record notes for each session
- View past and future sessions
- See payment status

To access it, click **"View file"** from the patient card or from an appointment in the schedule.

searchPatients.title: Search and filter patients
searchPatients.content:
You can search for patients in several ways:

1. **Search by name:** Use the search bar
2. **Filter by modality:** In-person, remote, or mixed
3. **Filter by frequency:** Weekly, biweekly, or monthly
4. **Sessions this week:** Show only patients with upcoming appointments

Filters can be combined for more specific results.

registerPayment.title: Register a payment
registerPayment.content:
To register a payment:

1. Go to the **Billing** section from the sidebar
2. Find the pending session in the "Pending" tab
3. Click **"Collect"**
4. Confirm the amount and payment method
5. Save the payment

**Tip:** You can also register payments directly from the patient file.

paymentHistory.title: View payment history
paymentHistory.content:
The payment history shows:

- All payments made
- Date and amount of each payment
- Associated patient
- Payment description

You can filter by date range using quick filters (week, month) or by selecting custom dates.

sendReminder.title: Send payment reminder
sendReminder.content:
To send a reminder:

1. In the "Pending" tab, find the session
2. Click **"Reminder"**
3. Review the predefined message (you can edit it)
4. Choose to send via WhatsApp or copy the message

The message automatically includes the session data and amount.

profile.title: Edit your profile
profile.content:
Your profile has two parts:

**Account data (managed by Clerk)**
- First and last name
- Profile picture
- Email and password

To edit this data, click your avatar and select **"Manage account"**.

**Professional data**

To edit your professional information:

1. Go to the **Profile** section from the sidebar
2. Modify your data (license, specialty, phones, etc.)
3. Click **"Save Changes"**

Professional data includes: license number, specialty, contact phones, office address, social media, and bio.

calendarConfig.title: Configure calendar
calendarConfig.content:
In the Settings section you can:

- Connect or disconnect Google Calendar
- View sync status
- Force a manual sync

Sync is bidirectional: changes in Lavenius appear in your Google Calendar and vice versa.

hero.badge: Smart management for mental health professionals
hero.title: Complete control of your practice
hero.description: Ditch Excel and paper. Save time with smart scheduling, automated billing tracking, and all your patient information in one place.

features.title: Everything you need in one place
features.subtitle: Modules designed specifically for mental health professionals

scheduler.title: Smart Scheduler
scheduler.description: Manage availability and recurrence rules (bi-weekly, monthly). Sync with Google Calendar.

payments.title: Billing Management
payments.description: Rigorous payment tracking with automatic reminders via WhatsApp and Email.

records.title: Digital Records
records.description: Secure clinical records, informed consents, and initial screening questionnaires.

calendar.title: Calendar Sync
calendar.description: Full synchronization with your calendar to avoid overlaps and missed appointments.

analytics.title: Full visibility of your professional practice
analytics.description: Make informed decisions with clear data about your income, completed sessions, and monthly growth metrics.

reminders.title: Reduce delinquency without manual effort
reminders.description: The system sends automatic reminders to your patients via WhatsApp or Email, both to confirm appointments and to manage pending payments.

messages.sessionReminder: Hi Maria! We remind you of your session tomorrow at 3:00 PM. Can you confirm your attendance?
messages.appointmentConfirmed: Pedro Lopez confirmed his Friday 2:00 PM appointment

security.title: Clinical-grade security
security.description: All your patient data is protected with AES-256-GCM encryption end-to-end. We comply with the highest security standards to protect sensitive information.

socialProof.title: Therapists who already organized their practice

1.quote: I can finally focus on my patients instead of chasing payments. It changed my work life.
1.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson

2.quote: I tried several apps but none understood how a therapist works. This one does.
2.name: Dr. Michael Chen

3.quote: The Google Calendar sync and WhatsApp reminders are amazing. My patients always show up.
3.name: Dr. Emily Davis

whyLavenius.title: What other apps don't give you
whyLavenius.subtitle: See how we compare to the market

unlimited.title: Unlimited patients
unlimited.description: Unlike other apps that limit you to 5 patients on the basic plan. Here, as many as you want from day 1.

encryption.title: Real encryption
encryption.description: AES-256-GCM end-to-end. Not just a HIPAA logo at the bottom of the page, but real protection.

localPricing.title: Transparent pricing
localPricing.description: Clear, predictable pricing. No surprises, no hidden fees, no complicated calculations.

noContracts.title: No contracts, no hassle
noContracts.description: Cancel whenever you want. No minimum commitment, no fine print, no strings attached.

faq.title: Got questions?
faq.subtitle: Here are the most common ones answered

security.question: Is my data and my patients' data secure?
security.answer: Yes, 100%. We use AES-256-GCM end-to-end encryption. That means even we can't read your clinical notes. Only you with your passphrase can access sensitive information.

cancel.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancel.answer: Yes, no hassle. No minimum commitment, no contracts. Cancel from your profile in 2 clicks and you're done.

modality.question: Does it work for in-person and online therapy?
modality.answer: Yes, for both. You can mark each session as in-person or remote, and the system adapts for reminders and organization.

patientLimit.question: Is there a patient limit?
patientLimit.answer: No, unlimited patients from the most basic plan. We don't charge you more to grow.

trial.question: Can I try it for free before paying?
trial.answer: Of course! You get 14 days free trial with all features. No credit card required.

support.question: What if I have problems or questions?
support.answer: Just reach out and we'll respond. Real human support from people who understand your work.

cta.title: Start managing your practice smartly
cta.subtitle: Join professionals who have already saved hours of administrative work

pricing.title: Choose the ideal plan for your practice
pricing.subtitle: No hidden costs. Cancel anytime. Start free and scale as you grow.
